animal.question: I say 'meow'. I like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with string.

animal.question: I say 'woof woof'. I like to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕‍🦺 I can be a very good friend

animal.question: I go 'quack, quack'. I swim in the pond. What am I?
I say 'moo'. I give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🖤 I am often black and white.
🔔 Sometimes I wear a bell around my neck

animal.question: I have a long trunk. I like to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I can pick up nuts with my nose.
🚿 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I hop around. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat lettuce too.

animal.question: I swing from trees. I like to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to make funny faces.

animal.question: I roar. I am the king of the jungle. What am I?
I am green. I live in the water and on land. I have a big mouth. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I like to bask in the sun.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🐎 I run very fast across the plains

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not a bird. I'm cold and wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall

weather.question: I'm big and yellow and hot in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I shine brightly during the day
😎 You might wear sunglasses when I'm out

weather.question: I can be white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. What am I?
I make the leaves shake on the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make your hair messy
🪁 You can fly a kite with me

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can build a snowman with me
🧤 You need gloves when I am around

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am shaped like an arc
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet
🌦️ You can see me when the sun shines after rain

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of wind that spins around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift things up in the air
🏡 It is dangerous to be outside when I arrive
🌀 I look like a swirling funnel.

weather.question: I am very small balls of ice that fall from the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 I can hurt if I hit you
⛈️ I often come with thunder and lightning

weather.question: I'm a loud crash that you hear during a storm, after you see a flash of light. What am I?
I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm, before you hear the boom. What am I?
